name: Ashok Nagar
description: Ashok Nagar is a well-connected residential area in East Delhi, known for its proximity to Maharaja Agrasen College and excellent public transport links. The area offers affordable PG accommodations with easy access to markets, hospitals, and educational institutions.
highlights: 10 min walk to Maharaja Agrasen College

name: Vasundhara Enclave
description: Vasundhara Enclave is a prime residential locality in East Delhi bordering Noida. It offers a peaceful living environment with modern amenities, making it ideal for students and working professionals looking for quality PG accommodation.

name: Mayur Vihar
nearby_metro: Mayur Vihar Phase 1 Metro Station (Blue Line)
description: Mayur Vihar is one of the largest residential complexes in East Delhi, divided into three phases. It is well-connected by metro and buses, and offers a wide range of PG and hostel options for students attending colleges in the East Delhi-Noida belt.

name: Laxmi Nagar
description: Laxmi Nagar is one of Delhi's biggest coaching hubs, especially for UPSC, SSC, and banking exam preparation. Thousands of students flock here every year, creating massive demand for affordable PG and hostel accommodations.

name: Preet Vihar
description: Preet Vihar is a well-established residential colony in East Delhi known for its tree-lined streets and proximity to major educational institutions. The area provides a calm living environment ideal for students seeking focus during their academic years.

name: Nirman Vihar
description: Nirman Vihar is centrally located in East Delhi with excellent metro connectivity. It sits between Laxmi Nagar and Preet Vihar, making it convenient for students attending multiple coaching centres and colleges in the area.

name: IP Extension (Patparganj)
description: IP Extension, also known as Patparganj Industrial Area, is a rapidly developing locality in East Delhi. It offers a mix of residential and commercial spaces, with numerous PG options available for students and working professionals.

name: Noida Sector 18
description: Sector 18 is the commercial heart of Noida, famous for Atta Market and Great India Place mall. Students from Amity University and other Noida colleges often seek PGs in nearby Delhi areas like Vasundhara Enclave for more affordable options.

name: Near Maharaja Agrasen College
description: The area surrounding Maharaja Agrasen College (MAC) in Ashok Nagar is one of the most popular destinations for student PG accommodations in East Delhi. With affordable options, proximity to the college, and vibrant student life, it remains a top choice every admission season.

name: Near Shaheed Rajguru College
description: Shaheed Rajguru College of Applied Sciences for Women is located in Vasundhara Enclave. Female students of this college often look for safe, well-managed girls-only PG accommodations in the surrounding area.

name: East Delhi
description: East Delhi is one of the most student-friendly zones in the national capital. Home to Maharaja Agrasen College, coaching hubs in Laxmi Nagar, and close to the Noida border, it offers the best value-for-money PG accommodations in Delhi.
